dialogue.introduction: We are Hatsuharu. With us following, thou wilt be fine!
dialogue.library_intro: We are the 1st Hatsuharu-class destroyer, Hatsuharu. We were attached to the Northern Force. As the clouds of war gathers, we did our duty in the Northern seas at such places as Attu and Kiska. The seas around Hokkaido are our favourite, no? The Gulf of Manila and Ormoc... ah, we are weak to the heat.
dialogue.secretary1: Oh, are you interested in us?
dialogue.secretary2: Yes, this is how you should be treating us.
dialogue.secretary3: You really can't calm down, can you?... Why is that? Dost thou take such interest in us?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Aah, well, you know, it would be all right if we did some work... it would be all right, you know?
dialogue.secretarymarried: You should... rest a little better as well. Of course, we can rest when it's important. ...It's pleasant!
dialogue.wedding: You...!? W-w-w-w-aaa! To expose us to such shameful words! Shame on you! For shame...
dialogue.show_players_score: That's right, information is important. Good good. There is a lot to inquire from this.
dialogue.equipment1: Yes. We became stronger once more.
dialogue.equipment2: Did you not say that the equipment up to now was not quite up to par?
dialogue.supply: We are grateful... no hardships in this.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Phew... this bath is nice. As I thought, cypress-tree baths are supreme.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: This arsenal has such skilled craftsman, we are unperturbed.
dialogue.docking_complete: Good grief.. Are the repairs finally finished?
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship is complete, perchance?
dialogue.return_from_sortie: It appears that the fleet has returned. Surely, a triumph?
dialogue.battle_start: Thou wishest to see our dance? Very well... we shall show thee plenty!
dialogue.night_battle: At long last... we shall demonstrate our true purpose!
dialogue.mvp: This triumph, it was not solely due to our efforts. Everyone did their part.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Verily, thou shalt experience our wrath!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: 'Tis but a scratch! We shall not sink from just this!
dialogue.christmas_2014: Ku, Kurisu...masu... thou sayeth?! Quite the queer feast! T-this is... chicken? I see...
dialogue.new_year_2015: It's Hatsuharu! How auspicious. Let us celebrate this year together!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Yes, we are content! To celebrate a day like this one with you, we too are happy. Good.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Hm! Setsubun is an important ceremony! It holds many meanings! Oh, you knew?
